data.title: Diaspora
data.meta_description: OFFICE OF THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR DIASPORA AFFAIRS
data.text:
Diaspora Youth Ambassador

A program for young adults 20 to 35 years old, aimed at creating a dynamic network of Armenian youth ambassadors around the world.

Details

Step Toward Home

Two week educational summer program for Diaspora youth 13 to 18 years old, aimed at the preservation and development of Armenian national identity.

Details

iGorts

Fellowship Program for Armenian professionals from the Diaspora to work in the Armenian Government.

Details

NerUzh

Tech startup program designed to introduce diaspora entrepreneurs to the possibilities of basing their startups in Armenia.

Details

Diaspora Connected

Video conferences with Armenian Diaspora communities from around the world during the COVID-19 era.

Details

Medical Support

Engaging Diaspora health care professionals in the treatment of COVID-19 and post-war mental and physical rehabilitation.

Details

Employment Support Program

Employment support for Lebanese Armenians, who have repatriated or are willing to move and work in Armenia.

Details

GovTech Launchpad

Opportunity for tech startups worldwide who can come up with creative solutions to support and ease the process of repatriation.

Details

Repatriation and Integration Center

In order to effectively organize the process of repatriation and ensure rapid integration into Armenian society, the Office of the High Commissioner for Diaspora Affairs has established a fir

Details

DiasPro

A volunteer program for professionals from the Diaspora

Details

Institute of Diaspora Commissioners

The goal is to expand the networking capabilities of the Office of the High Commissioner for Diaspora Affairs.

Details
